name: Formance
headline: Open Source Infrastructure for the Financial Internet
description:
Formance Platform is building open-source infrastructure for the next wave of financial services. It enables fintech engineers to build and operate complex flow of funds, weaving together multiple payment rails with internal ledger accounts.

github.com/formancehq/stack

founders.name: Clément Salaün, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Formance, making complex payments workflows work. Previously @Selency.

raw_markdown='[newsWe secured $21 Million in Series A Funding co-led by PayPal Ventures and Portage Ventures](https://formance.com/</blog/company/formance-secures-21-million-dollar-in-series-a-funding-co-led-by-paypal-ventures-and-portage-ventures-to-expand-its-open-source-financial-infrastructure>)

[](https://formance.com/<https:/github.com/formancehq>)[Sign In](https://formance.com/<https:/portal.formance.cloud?ref=website>)[Request a demo](https://formance.com/</contact>)
# Open SourceFinancial Core
Build bespoke flows of funds using the partners of your choice on the Formance agnostic infrastructure
[Get started](https://formance.com/<https:/portal.formance.cloud?ref=website>)[Request a demo](https://formance.com/</contact>)
![home-hero](https://formance.cdn.prismic.io/formance/ZnLa5Jm069VX14lK_home-hero.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=3840)
Trusted by leading companies to build and operate their financial backend
Current limitations to growth
## Is your product limited by a legacy financial infrastructure?
  * ### Product & Payments
#### Feeling limited by your current financial stack?
Are you facing rigidity in your current stack and providers that prevent building custom flow of funds and features? What if you were provided a toolkit that empowers you to develop limitless use cases tailored to your specific business context?
  * ### Engineering
#### Struggling with siloed & legacy in-house system?
In-house development and custom integrations of additional financial partnersare highly time and resource-consuming. Picture a world featuring a unified data layer and an agnostic financial infrastructure, enabling you to effortlessly scale, free from performance hurdles.
  * ### Revenue
#### Missing strategic product opportunities?
You may be leaving money on the table due to underused financial products and an inefficient infrastructure. Unlock additional revenue streams and improve unit economics through new financial features, supported by the partners of your choice.


PLATFORM
## Modular, Extensible Financial Backend
Start owning your financial business logic by using Formance agnostic infrastructure and connect with the financial partners of your choice.
![modular-extensible](https://formance.cdn.prismic.io/formance/ZmL4HJm069VX1jQs_modular-extensible.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=3840)
  * ### Ownership & control
With Open Source core components andmultiple hosting options available.
  * ### 100% agnostic
Abstraction layer that can be pluggedwith any type of financial providers.
  * ### Fully programmable
For engineering and payments teams. No limitation tied to your vendor’s roadmap.


Testimonials
> Formance enabled us to ship new lending products faster by providing a customizable foundation for our flow of funds and domain specifics.
Tito Sarrionandia, VP of Engineering at Liberis
> Anyone can offer performance and reliability, but no one else can offer the level of trust that Formance does.
Shaun Martin, Director of Engineering at Newton
> Handling money movements at scale is challenging. When you deal with money, Formance is an absolute no-brainer. 
François Ruty, CTO at Shares
> Formance brings the flexibility we need in our payment system to scale our ride-hailing and delivery platform.
Josef Puchinger, CTO at Angkas
Previous slideNext slide
Modules
## Modular & Agnostic Primitives
The Formance Platform is a suite of financial primitives built on a unified data layer, encapsulating the intelligence and business logic of financial transactions in one place.
![ledger-logo](https://formance.com/_next/static/media/ledger.f604bf96.svg)Ledger
![connectivity-logo](https://formance.com/_next/static/media/payments.cdad4469.svg)Connectivity
![flows-logo](https://formance.com/_next/static/media/flows.dc308ef7.svg)Flows
![reconciliation-logo](https://formance.com/_next/static/media/reconciliation.4e6734b0.svg)Reconciliation
### Record your money flows in database
Record real-time money movements on a programmable financial ledger built for scalable asset tracking.
[Explore ledger](https://formance.com/</modules/ledger>)
#### Unlimited sub-ledgers
Scale horizontally with unlimited sub-ledgers. Choose your sharding strategy from one unique ledger to a ledger per user.
#### Ledger as a Foundation
The ledger is a low-level accounting tool, on which a lot of other services can be built. Wallets services, Reconciliation services and counting.
![ledger-overview](https://images.prismic.io/formance/ZnRK3Jm069VX17Pu_ledger-overview.webp?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=1920)
Connectors
## Extensive Connectivity
Connect your Formance Platform to the financial provider or payment processor of your choice.Use one of the connectors available or create your own
[See connectors](https://formance.com/</connectors>)[Build connector](https://formance.com/<https:/docs.formance.com/payments/get-started/connectors/framework>)
![extensive-connectivity](https://formance.cdn.prismic.io/formance/ZmLobpm069VX1i5q_extensive.svg?auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=max&w=3840)
Customers
## The love working with us
Previous slideNext slide
> Formance enabled us to ship new lending products faster by providing a customizable foundation that let us reliably express the complexities of our flow of funds and domain specifics.
Tito Sarrionandia, VP of Engineering at Liberis
> Formance is like our accounting Swiss Army knife. They provide us with flexible foundational tools for ledgering and payment initiation.
Ross Kinmont, CPO at getmomo
[See customer story](https://formance.com/</blog/customers/getmomo>)
> We needed a solution to support our new consumer financial products in the Egyptian market, with integration for local PSPs, Fawry and Paymob. The Formance connector framework made this possible.
Osama Abdelmoghini, CTO (b_labs)
> Anyone can offer performance and reliability, but no one else can offer the level of trust that Formance does.
Shaun Martin, Director of Engineering at Newton
[See customer story](https://formance.com/</blog/customers/newton>)
> Handling money movements at scale is challenging. When you deal with money, Formance is an absolute no-brainer. 
François Ruty, CTO at Shares
[See customer story](https://formance.com/</blog/customers/shares>)
> Formance brings the flexibility we need in our payment system to scale our ride-hailing and delivery platform.
Josef Puchinger, CTO at Angkas
Security
## Enterprise-Grade Security
Your core financial infrastructure requires security.We make sure to keep your infrastructure safe & reliable.
[See our Trust Center](https://formance.com/<https:/app.vanta.com/formance/trust/oad6ewh0sq590pfemkg4gk>)
  * ### SOC 2 Type II Certified
We obtained SOC 2 Type II certification and we are constantly working on our compliance.
  * ### ISO 27001 Certified
We are certified by Johanson group, affirming our commitment to the highest standards of security.
  * ### Cloud or Self-Hosted
Use our Cloud or host your financial backendusing the hosting provider of your choice.
  * ### Open Source
Source code with lifetime access, offering transparency along with a community support.
  * ### Standard Authentication Protocols
Enhanced security and integration with seamless authentication with OAuth, JWT, OIDC.
  * ### Penetration Testing
Third-party security firms undertake regular penetration tests on every product we build.


Press
> [[...] the next standard financial ledger for money movements, starting with an open source base and taking aim at developers — the power behind the power](https://formance.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2021/09/01/here-are-all-the-companies-from-day-two-of-y-combinators-summer-2021-demo-day/>)
TechCrunch
> [Championing a so-called ledger-as-a-service, the software enables startups to consolidate all transactions into one place](https://formance.com/<https:/sifted.eu/articles/ycombinator-fintech/>)
Sifted
Previous slideNext slide

Drop us a note, or start your free cloud sandbox.
[Get started](https://formance.com/<https:/portal.formance.cloud?ref=website>)[Contact us](https://formance.com/</contact>)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Formance**

Founded in 2021 and based in Paris, France, Formance aims to revolutionize the financial infrastructure landscape through open-source solutions. The brainchild of Y Combinator Batch S21, Formance primarily targets fintech engineers, providing them with the tools needed to build and operate intricate fund flow systems. By connecting various payment rails with internal ledger accounts, their platform embodies what they term the "Financial Internet."

### Mission
At its core, Formance's mission is clear: to create open-source infrastructure to support the next wave of financial services. This philosophy not only enhances flexibility but also promotes transparency and collaboration within the financial technology sector.

### Team & Leadership
The company currently boasts a compact team of 14 dedicated employees, under the guidance of Group Partner Aaron Epstein. 

### Products & Services
Formance offers modular and extensible financial backends that enable businesses to forge their own paths in handling financial operations. Key features include:
- **Ledger**: A programmable financial ledger designed for scalable asset tracking with unlimited sub-ledgers.
- **Connectors**: Extensive connectivity options allow seamless integration with various financial providers and payment processors, including popular names like Stripe and Adyen.
- **Documentations and Resources**: Comprehensive resources are available for users, including extensive documentation to assist developers.

### Recent Developments
In a significant boost to its growth plans, Formance recently secured $21 million in Series A funding, jointly led by PayPal Ventures and Portage Ventures. This funding is aimed at expanding its open-source financial infrastructure capabilities.

### Customer Feedback
Formance is endorsed by a range of clients, many of whom praise its customizable foundation for effectively managing their financial flows. Clients reported improved agility in launching new financial products and enhanced trust, illustrating the platform's impact on operational efficiency.

### Security & Compliance
Understanding the critical need for security in finance, Formance has achieved SOC 2 Type II certification and ISO 27001 certification. They offer both cloud and self-hosted options, ensuring robust security while maintaining transparency with open source accessibility.

### Conclusion
Formance stands out as a pivotal player in the fintech space, enabling companies to escape the limitations of legacy financial systems. Their innovative, open-source infrastructure offers the agility and customization necessary to thrive in today’s digital marketplace. With a strong foundation and backing, the future appears bright for Formance as it leads the charge into a new era of financial services.

For more information, explore their [official website](https://formance.com) or [GitHub](https://github.com/formancehq/stack).
